official_title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for the vessel M/V Northern Victor.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation and the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for involvement in the U.S. fisheries trade.

titles.title: To authorize issuance of a certificate of documentation for the vessel M/V Northern Victor.
